name: Stephanie Nishi
title: Show Host & Content Creator
bio: Hi All! I'm Steph, a Registered Dietitian and PhD candidate with the Department of Nutritional Sciences studying cardiometabolic health at St. Michael's Hospital.  I'm excited to be a part of the Raw Talk team as a Show Host and Content Creator, and am looking forward to sharing scientific stories with you â€“ so stay tuned! Along with research, nutritional sciences, and making credible scientific information accessible and engaging, I enjoy cooking/baking, checking out new music, being active, including: running, kayaking, biking, or playing volleyball, and am always looking for new things to discover! #keepitraw
